content.description: The following questions refer to the below image.
content.question: Which of the following narratives is illustrated by the sculpture?

choices.label: The death of a Trojan priest
The expulsion of snakes from Delphi

content.answer: The death of a Trojan priest

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
